content: Seoul Watching the exhibition Super Heart of the niche art gallery D MuseumD Museum is a small white building, located in Hannandong near Itaiyuan, surrounded by international schools and high-end neighborhoods, the location is very quiet. Because the exhibition content is stylish and light art, it is also suitable for taking pictures, so it is very popular in South Korea. When visiting the gallery, young Korean ladies and young couples came to dating me. The exhibition I Draw theme exhibition was held from February to September 2019, featuring illustrative works, installation artworks and other artworks from 16 artists from all over the world. The total number of exhibits is as many as 350, the content is very rich and the style is different, I am too busy to visit for nearly 2 hours, the price is too high! The last visit with theme-related peripheral products and blingbling pink girl heart stationery sold only 6 exhibitions in the past 4 years, but ushered in millions of people to see, and ins became a local phenomenon-level art gallery. In addition to the selection of exhibit content is very careful and fits the theme, the curation level is high-quality, you can feel the management and the curator's original intention concept is very clear, the target customer group is young people this is also very clear, with the help of social media communication power, no fire is strange! ⚠️ Monday closing business hours: weekdays 10:00-18:00, Friday and Saturday 10:00-20:00 adult 12,000 won (you can register for discounts on the museum's official website) Address: 5-6 Dokseodang-ro 29-gil, Yongsan-gu, Seoul2019 GOOD BUY theme new exhibition is on display from September 20th to November 24th, 5-6 Dokseodang-ro 29-gil, Yongsan-gu, Seoul2019 Friends traveling in Korea eat me Amway!

This Puxin Pavilion is not very big, only one building. Originally built in 1396, it was destroyed many times in wars and fires. Also used as a fire alarm, guards line up at the entrance or around the base and ring the bell at noon every day. If you arrive in time, you can climb up and watch, and even help ring the bell.

Puxinge Pavilion is a giant bell tower located in Zhonglu District, Seoul, Republic of Korea. It is famous for its bell ringing ceremony on the evening of December 31 every year. At that time, many Korean celebrities, politicians and stars will attend the bell ringing ceremony, and the place will become a sea of people. In addition, the lively restaurants, barbecues, pubs and cafes in the surrounding streets and alleys, people greet each other warmly, which really makes people feel colorful and full of vitality.

Puxin Pavilion was first built in 1936, but it was destroyed many times by war and fire. Now the Buddhist temple was built in 1985. In ancient times, the big bells in temples were also used as fire alarms. Just get off at Zhongge Metro Station on Line 1, or you can walk from Guanghua Gate. It's very close.

LEGOLAND Korea Resort, located in Chuncheon, Gangwon Province, South Korea, opened in 2022. It features over 40 rides, shows, and attractions across seven themed zones, including Bricktopia, LEGO Castle, and Pirate Shores. The resort also includes a LEGOLAND Hotel, offering a fully immersive LEGO experience. It is the first LEGOLAND built on an island, combining unique cultural elements with the classic LEGO theme, making it a popular destination for families and LEGO enthusiasts.

Legoland Korea is a theme park located in Chuncheon, South Korea, and is part of the global chain of Legoland parks. Opened in May 2022, it is the first Legoland park in South Korea and the second in Asia, following Legoland Malaysia. Legoland Korea is situated on Hajung Island in Chuncheon, about 75 kilometers (46 miles) northeast of Seoul. Its location on an island makes it unique among other Legoland parks.

Kimchi mainly depends on the fermentation of lactic acid bacteria to produce a large amount of lactic acid, not by salt osmotic pressure to suppress corrupt microorganisms. Kimchi uses low concentration of salt water, or a small amount of salt to pickle various fresh vegetables, and then fermented by lactic acid bacteria to make a sour enamel product, as long as the lactic acid content reaches a certain concentration, and the product is isolated from the air, you can achieve the purpose of long storage.

Kimchi is one of the most popular snacks in Korea. It is a long-term storage of fermented vegetables, Koreans' pre-dinner snacks. There are many different kinds of kimchi alone, and they are free to eat before meals, if not enough, you can add it for free. Come to Korea to experience kimchi culture, learn about history, and learn how to make it is also a good experience.
